points are point complete begin working in row one point at a time over next 8 sts step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang special methods cable co insert right needle from front to back between first and second sts on left ndl wrap yarn around ndl pull loop through place loop on left ndl 1 st co picot using the knitted cast-on co 2 sts bobble 2 sts kwise rs using the knitted cast-on co 2 sts bobble 2 sts pwise ws top picot using cable cast
